quote: "Discipline equals freedom."
"Good. Now we have an opportunity to get better."
"Get up early, do the work, and win the day."
"Take ownership. Take extreme ownership. Don’t make excuses. Don’t blame any other person or any other thing."
"There is no growth in the comfort zone."
"Stop checking social media and start checking your own internal dialogue."
"You have to learn to control your emotions."
"The only easy day was yesterday."
"If you want to be tougher, be tougher."
"Don’t expect to be motivated every day to get out there and make things happen. You won’t be. Don’t count on motivation. Count on Discipline."
"Get after it."
"Stay humble, or you will be humbled."
"You are in control of your mind, your attitude, and your actions."
"There’s no shortcut to greatness."
"Weakness is strong. I must be stronger."
"Default aggressive."
"No matter how bad things are, you can always make them worse."
"A person’s character is not only defined by their success, but also by how they handle adversity."
"You have to push yourself beyond what you think is possible."
"Cover and move."
"It’s not what you preach, it’s what you tolerate."
"Get comfortable being uncomfortable."
"The enemy is within."
"Set your expectations low, but your goals high."
"Your actions reflect your goals."
"When things are going bad, there’s going to be some good that comes from it."
"You have to build trust in your team and lead by example."
"Be decisive in the face of uncertainty."
"Hesitation is the enemy of progress."
"Be the best version of yourself every single day."
"Success comes from consistency."
"Discipline equals freedom."
"The most important thing a leader can do is lead by example."
"The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war."
"Get after it. Every day."
"If you want to change the world, start by making your bed."
"Pain is weakness leaving the body."
"It's not what you preach, it's what you tolerate."
"Simplicity is the key to brilliance."
"Stay humble. Stay hungry."
"Leadership requires belief in the mission and unyielding perseverance to achieve victory."
"One meal at a time. One workout at a time. You are in control."
"Take the path of most resistance."
"The more difficult the task, the greater the reward."
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"Don't be a spectator in your own life."
"Take charge of your own life."
"Success is not owned, it's rented, and the rent is due every day."
"Don't let fear hold you back."
"You have to earn your success."
"When things go wrong, don't go with them."
"The key to success is to keep moving forward."
"The only way to get what you want is to work for it."
"When things are going bad, there's going to be some good that's going to come from it."
"Don't think in the morning. That's a big mistake that people make. They wake up in the morning and they start thinking. Don't think. Just execute the plan."
"We all have a tendency to avoid our weaknesses. When we do that, we never progress or get any better."
"If you get your ego in your way, you will only look to other people and circumstances to blame."
"When a team takes ownership of its problems, the problem gets solved. It is true on the battlefield, it is true in business, and it is true in life."
"There is one thing that gets you out of bed in the morning, and that is discipline. Because your dreams and your goals are not there waking up for you in the morning."
"Jiu Jitsu is probably the No. 1 activity that I could recommend to someone to improve their lives overall."
"Don't worry about motivation. Motivation is fickle. It comes and goes. It is unreliable—and when you are counting on motivation to get your goals accomplished, you will likely fall short."
"If you continue to keep low performers on your team, that are actually dragging the team down; you're failing the whole team, and eventually, the whole team is going to fail."
